mapper.sql: Id, ControlId, OrderNum, Name, Title, DefaultValue, ControlData
mapper.insert: insert into TemplateDetail (Id, ControlId, OrderNum, Name, Title, DefaultValue, ControlData) values (#{id,jdbcType=BIGINT}, #{controlid,jdbcType=BIGINT}, #{ordernum,jdbcType=INTEGER}, #{name,jdbcType=NVARCHAR}, #{title,jdbcType=NVARCHAR}, #{defaultvalue,jdbcType=NVARCHAR}, #{controldata,jdbcType=NVARCHAR})

insert into TemplateDetail
Id,
ControlId,
OrderNum,
Name,
Title,
DefaultValue,
ControlData,

mapper.update:
update TemplateDetail
ControlId = #{controlid,jdbcType=BIGINT},
OrderNum = #{ordernum,jdbcType=INTEGER},
Name = #{name,jdbcType=NVARCHAR},
Title = #{title,jdbcType=NVARCHAR},
DefaultValue = #{defaultvalue,jdbcType=NVARCHAR},
ControlData = #{controldata,jdbcType=NVARCHAR},
where Id = #{id,jdbcType=BIGINT}

update TemplateDetail set ControlId = #{controlid,jdbcType=BIGINT}, OrderNum = #{ordernum,jdbcType=INTEGER}, Name = #{name,jdbcType=NVARCHAR}, Title = #{title,jdbcType=NVARCHAR}, DefaultValue = #{defaultvalue,jdbcType=NVARCHAR}, ControlData = #{controldata,jdbcType=NVARCHAR} where Id = #{id,jdbcType=BIGINT}
mapper.select: SELECT TC.ControlType , Title , Name , DefaultValue , ControlData , OrderNum FROM dbo.TemplateDetail AS td ( NOLOCK ) LEFT JOIN dbo.TemplateControl AS tc ( NOLOCK ) ON td.ControlId = tc.id WHERE td.TemplateId = #{templateId,jdbcType=INTEGER} ORDER BY OrderNum ASC
